snippet: Among the hot topics is the recent Delaware Chancery Court litigation involving Kinder Morgan's acquisition of the El Paso Corporation and Tokio Marine Financial's acquisition of Delphi Financial.
abstract: Among the hot topics is the recent Delaware Chancery Court litigation involving Kinder Morgan's acquisition of the El Paso Corporation and Tokio Marine Financial's acquisition of Delphi Financial.

headline.main: What the Deal Makers Are Talking About at Tulane
